The photos were published on Facebook on: 2019, and have been shared more than 31,000 times.
The images show new coins in circulation: including a 5,000-peso coin, which would amount to approximately US$100.
The post: s Tagalog-language caption translates to English as: "Heard these are the new money now seriously they made everything coins".
The Philippine central bank: s official website confirms that the coins shown in the photos are either commemorative non-circulation coins or new generation coins minted for aesthetics and security purposes.
